title: LED Night Kayak - Condado Lagoon Guided Excursion
overview: This night paddle gets you around Condado Lagoon by clear-bottom kayak while the water is illuminated by the glow of LEDs. Glide past San Juan’s city lights and pass under a historic bridge with your guide in the lead. Marvel at the marine life on display, from bait fish and lobster to giant orange sea stars and stingrays.
review: At first it’s gonna seem scary but after getting a hang of it your gonna love it . I had fun and Brian the tour guy was very nice he was my partner since it a party of 3 & I was singled out . Joaf was wonderful he takes the photos of you so don’t worry about bringing your phone…
